recommendation.resetDataTitle: Clear the recommendation pool and statistical data
recommendation.resetConfirm:
‚ö†Ô∏è Are you sure you want to reset all recommendation data?

This will clear:
- All recommendations in the recommendation pool
- Recommendation count statistics for RSS feeds
- AI scoring and analysis data for all articles (can be re-analyzed)
- TF-IDF score cache for all articles (can be recalculated)
- Recommendation-related statistics

‚ö†Ô∏è Note: Fully crawled article content will be preserved

This action cannot be undone!
recommendation.learningStageNote: Not recommended during the exploration phase, focusing on learning your interests.

privacy.title: Data and Privacy
privacy.disabled: Will be enabled after completing 100 pages
privacy.description: Manage your data and privacy settings

analysisEngine.title: Analysis Engine Selection

descriptions.remoteAI: Using remote AI services to balance cost and quality.
descriptions.remoteAIWithReasoning: Using reasoning AI (DeepSeek-R1), costs about 10 times more but delivers better quality.
descriptions.localAI: Using local AI (Ollama/Chrome AI), privacy-protected but performance-intensive
descriptions.keyword: Using the TF-IDF keyword algorithm, fastest and cost-free.

capability.needEnableReasoning: Enable reasoning capability in the AI engine settings.
capability.noLocalAI: No local AI detected (requires installing Ollama or using a Chrome AI-supported browser)

hint.recommendation: üí° The recommendation system supports 4 types of engines: Remote AI, Inference AI, Local AI, and Pure Keywords.
hint.feed: üí° Feed analysis supports 3 types of engines: Remote AI, Local AI, and Pure Keywords (does not support inference mode, considering cost and speed factors)

analysisEngine.label: Analytical Engine

desc.remoteAI: Using remote AI services to balance cost and quality.
desc.remoteAIWithReasoning: Using reasoning AI (DeepSeek-R1), costs about 10 times more but delivers better quality.
desc.localAI: Using local AI (Ollama/Chrome AI), protects privacy but consumes performance
desc.keyword: Using the TF-IDF keyword algorithm, fastest and cost-free.

unavailable.remoteAI: AI API is not configured, please go to the AI configuration page to set it up.
unavailable.remoteAIWithReasoning: Requires DeepSeek API with inference capability enabled
unavailable.localAI: No local AI detected (requires installation of Ollama or a browser with Chrome AI support)

analysisEngine.feedDescription: Select the analysis engine to be used uniformly for all feeds (reasoning mode is not supported to control costs).

stats.hint: A higher read rate indicates more accurate recommendations. The AI will continuously optimize the recommendation algorithm based on your feedback.

dataStats.dataManagementHint: Data management features will be available in subsequent versions.

collectionStats.textAnalysisHint: Continue browsing the webpage, and the system will automatically extract and analyze the content.
collectionStats.dwellTimeHint: Pages with a stay of more than 30 seconds
collectionStats.aiConfigPromptDesc: Configure AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, DeepSeek) for more accurate semantic understanding and topic classification.
collectionStats.dataManagementRebuild: Rebuild Profile: Reanalyze interest preferences based on existing browsing data
collectionStats.dataManagementClearData: Clear Data and Start Over: Delete browsing history and profile, begin from scratch
collectionStats.dataManagementClearAll: Clear All Data: Complete erasure including recommendation records
collectionStats.autoUpdateFirst: First Build: Automatically creates a profile after browsing 10 pages.
collectionStats.autoUpdateIncremental: Incremental Update: Smartly updates after every 5 pages of new content
collectionStats.autoUpdateManual: Manual Rebuild: Force refresh the profile at any time

alerts.profileAutoUpdated: ‚úÖ User profile has been automatically updated
alerts.analyzeFailed: Analysis failed, please try again later.
alerts.diagnosticFailed: Diagnosis failed, please try again later.
alerts.cleanInvalidConfirm:
Are you sure you want to clean up invalid records?
This will delete records with empty keyword arrays (such as search pages, homepages, etc.)
alerts.cleanInvalidFailed: Cleanup failed, please try again later.
alerts.rebuildFailed: Rebuild failed, please try again later.
alerts.clearDataConfirm:
Are you sure you want to clear browsing history and rebuild the user profile?  
This will:  
- Delete all browsing records and analysis results  
- Remove the current user profile  
- Reset to the initial state  

‚ö†Ô∏è This action cannot be undone!
alerts.clearDataSuccess:
Data cleared successfully!
You can now start browsing again, and the system will automatically build a new user profile.
alerts.clearDataFailed: Clear failed, please try again later.
alerts.clearAllConfirm:
Are you sure you want to clear all data?  
This will delete:  
- All browsing history  
- All analysis results  
- User profiles  
- Recommendation records  

‚ö†Ô∏è This action cannot be undone! Please consider carefully!
alerts.clearAllFinalConfirm:
Final confirmation: Are you sure you want to clear all data?  
After clearing, it will return to the initial state, and data collection will need to start over.
alerts.clearAllSuccess:
All data cleared successfully!  
The extension has been restored to its initial state.
alerts.clearAllFailed: Clear failed, please try again later.

aiConfig.title: AI Configuration
aiConfig.description: Configure remote AI services for more accurate content analysis
aiConfig.apiKeyHint: The API Key will be encrypted and stored locally in the browser, and will not be uploaded to the server.
aiConfig.budgetHint: Will automatically downgrade to free keyword analysis after exceeding the budget
aiConfig.budgetWarning: It is recommended to set a reasonable budget to avoid unexpected costs (suggested {{range}})

none.label: None (AI Disabled)
none.description: Only use keyword analysis, without calling AI interfaces.

openai.label: OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini)
openai.description: Fast, accurate, and cost-effective ($0.15/M input, $0.6/M output)

anthropic.label: Anthropic (Claude-3-Haiku)
anthropic.description: High quality, slightly expensive ($0.25/M input, $1.25/M output)

deepseek.label: DeepSeek
deepseek.description: Domestically friendly, cheapest (¬•2/M input, ¬•3/M output, cache hit ¬•0.2/M)

messages.disableSuccess: AI is disabled, keyword analysis will be used.

errors.selectProviderAndKey: Please select a provider and enter the API Key
errors.invalidApiKeyFormat: The API Key format is incorrect.

info.title: About AI Analysis
info.withConfig: After configuration: Prioritize AI analysis (more accurate, paid)
info.withoutConfig: Not configured: Use free keyword analysis (available but with lower accuracy)
info.fallback: Downgrade strategy: Automatically fall back to keyword analysis when API fails or exceeds budget.
info.privacy: Privacy Protection: All data processing is done locally, and API Keys are stored encrypted.

cost.title: Cost Reference (per million tokens)
cost.example: Assuming 50 pages browsed per day, with an average of 1000 tokens per page and a 10% cache hit rate:
cost.note: The actual cost may vary depending on factors such as page content length and access frequency.

openai.title: OpenAI (USD)
openai.estimate: Depending on the model, approximately $0.07-$6.20 per month.

placeholders.model: Select Model (Optional, leave blank to use default model)

hints.apiKey: The API Key will be encrypted and stored locally in the browser, and will not be uploaded to the server.

aiConfig.localAIHint: üí° Local AI runs completely offline, protecting your privacy.
aiConfig.tfidfPurpose: Purpose: Fallback solution when AI is unavailable
aiConfig.keywordFeature1: Based on word frequency and importance
aiConfig.keywordFeature2: Supports Chinese and English word segmentation
aiConfig.scenarioContentAnalysis: Content Analysis - Topic Classification, Keyword Extraction
aiConfig.scenarioUserProfile: User Profile - Interest Modeling, Preference Prediction
aiConfig.scenarioRecommendation: Recommendation Generation - Content Matching, Recommendation Reasons
aiConfig.scenariosIntro: The AI engine provides intelligent services for Silent Feed across multiple scenarios:

scenarios.analysisDesc: Topic Classification, Keyword Extraction, Summary Generation
scenarios.profileDesc: Interest Modeling, Preference Prediction, Behavior Analysis
scenarios.recommendationDesc: Content Matching, Recommendation Reasons, Personalized Sorting

ollama.feature1: Supports multiple open-source models (Llama, Qwen, Gemma, etc.)
ollama.feature2: Data is processed entirely locally, ensuring privacy protection.
ollama.feature3: You need to install the Ollama service (ollama.com) yourself.

chromeAI.feature1: Chrome has a built-in Gemini Nano model
chromeAI.feature2: No additional installation required, ready to use out of the box.
chromeAI.feature3: Only supports Chrome 128+ and requires experimental features to be enabled

localAIDetails.hint: Local AI performance is affected by device configuration. It is recommended to use only when no remote AI configuration is available.

tfidf.intro: TF-IDF is a classic text analysis algorithm used as a fallback solution for AI:
tfidf.advantage1Desc: No API required, fully local computation
tfidf.note: TF-IDF accuracy is slightly lower than AI, suitable for daily lightweight use.

aiConfig.reasoningHint: üí° Use reasoning mode for complex tasks like recommendations to get a deeper thought process.
aiConfig.reasoningWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Reasoning mode significantly increases costs and is recommended only when deep analysis is needed.
aiConfig.reasoningUnavailable: ‚ùå The current provider does not support inference mode (only DeepSeek supports it).
aiConfig.reasoningFutureSupport: {{provider}} does not currently support inference mode, which may be available in future versions.

chromeAI.title: How to enable Chrome AI
chromeAI.description: Chrome AI is Google's built-in Gemini Nano model in the Chrome browser, running entirely offline to protect privacy.

step1.title: Check browser version
step1.content: Ensure your Chrome version is ‚â• 128 (visit chrome://version to check)

step2.title: Enable experimental features
step2.content: Visit the following address and set it to Enabled:

step3.title: Restart the browser
step3.content: Click the Relaunch button to restart Chrome

step4.title: Verify availability
step4.content: Return to this page and check if the Chrome AI status changes to "Available".

chromeAI.note: üí° On first use, Chrome will download the model file (about 1.5GB), please be patient.
chromeAI.urlCopied: Copied to clipboard! Please paste it into the address bar to open.

localAIControl.hint: After selection, the corresponding local AI option becomes available in the analysis engine.
